osvSchema.summary: spring-projects/spring-data-jpa: Depending upon JCenter/Bintray as an artifact repository
osvSchema.details:
spring-projects/spring-data-jpa: Depending upon JCenter/Bintray as an artifact repository

Using a deprecated artifact repository may eventually give attackers access for a supply chain attack.
This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in spring-projects/spring-data-jpa version 2.5.0-RC1 by commit 77aa1bbc5fcbb0cfb530c65cb57b2c8655173b00. For more details please see the references link.
